author: Special Correspondent
text:
Burglars broke into a house at Tiruvanmiyur and stole 15 sovereigns of gold jewellery and cash on Friday.

According to police, the house at Kamarajar Nagar belongs to Ramakrishnan. He had gone out of station and found the valuables missing on his return.

Based on a complaint, the police have registered a case and are investigating.
title: Burglary in Tiruvanmiyur
